title: Italian courgette frittata
ingredients: ['3 medium courgettes', '250g courgette flowers', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 small white onion, finely chopped', '1 bunch fresh parsley', '6 eggs', '4 to 5 mint leaves', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon grated Pecorino Romano cheese', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
